GK19ragh1-6u:2: kva sūryaprabhavo vaṃśaḥ kva cālpaviṣayā matiḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:7: maṇau vajrasamutkīrṇe sūtrasyevāsti me gatiḥ // Ragh(K)_1.4 //
GK19ragh1-6u:19: hemnaḥ saṃlakṣyate hyagnau viśuddhiḥ śyāmikāpi vā // Ragh(K)_1.10 //
GK19ragh1-6u:25: ātmakarmakṣamaṃ dehaṃ kṣātro dharma ivāśritaḥ // Ragh(K)_1.13 //
GK19ragh1-6u:37: śāstre ca vyāpṛtā buddhirmaurvī dhanuṣi cātatā // Ragh(K)_1.19 //
GK19ragh1-6u:39: phalānumeyāḥ prārambhāḥ saṃskārāḥ prāktanā iva // Ragh(K)_1.20 //
GK19ragh1-6u:42: jñāne maunaṃ kṣamā śaktau tyāge ślāghāviparyayaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:47: sa pitā pitarastāsāṃ kevalaṃ janmahetavaḥ // Ragh(K)_1.24 //
GK19ragh1-6u:49: apyarthakāmau tasyāstāṃ dharma eva manīṣiṇaḥ // Ragh(K)_1.25 //
GK19ragh1-6u:50: dudoha gāṃ sa yajñāya sasyāya maghavā divam /
GK19ragh1-6u:53: vyāvṛttā yatparasvebhyaḥ śrutau taskaratā sthitā // Ragh(K)_1.27 //
GK19ragh1-6u:57: tathā hi sarve tasyāsanparārthaikaphalā guṇāḥ // Ragh(K)_1.29 //
GK19ragh1-6u:63: tayā mene manasvinyā lakṣmyā ca vasudhādhipaḥ // Ragh(K)_1.32 //
GK19ragh1-6u:65: vilambitaphalaiḥ kālaṃ sa nināya manorathaiḥ // Ragh(K)_1.33 //
GK19ragh1-6u:67: īpsatā santatiṃ nyastā tena mantriṣu kosalā // Ragh(K)_1.34 //
GK19ragh1-6u:83: ṣaḍjasaṃvādinīḥ kekā dvidhā bhinnāḥ śikhaṇḍibhiḥ // Ragh(K)_1.42 //
GK19ragh1-6u:93: api laṅghitamadhvānaṃ bubudhe na budhopamaḥ // Ragh(K)_1.47 //
GK19ragh1-6u:112: tayorjagṛhatuḥ pādau rājā rājñī ca māgadhī /
GK19ragh1-6u:113: tau gururgurupatnī ca prītyā pratinanandatuḥ // Ragh(K)_1.57 //
GK19ragh1-6u:115: papraccha kuśalaṃ rājye rājyāśramamuniṃ muniḥ // Ragh(K)_1.58 //
GK19ragh1-6u:118: upapannaṃ nanu śivaṃ saptasvaṅgeṣu yasya me /
GK19ragh1-6u:119: daivīnāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ ca pratikartā tvamāpadām // Ragh(K)_1.60 //
GK19ragh1-6u:121: pratyādiśyanta iva me dṛṣṭalakṣyabhidaḥ śarāḥ // Ragh(K)_1.61 //
GK19ragh1-6u:127: sānubandhāḥ kathaṃ na syuḥ sampado me nirāpadaḥ // Ragh(K)_1.64 //
GK19ragh1-6u:129: na māmavati sadvīpā ratnasūrapi medinī // Ragh(K)_1.65 //
GK19ragh1-6u:135: santatiḥ śuddhavaṃśyā tu paratreha ca śarmaṇe // Ragh(K)_1.68 //
GK19ragh1-6u:136: tayā hīnaṃ vinetā māṃ kathaṃ paśyanna dūyate /
GK19ragh1-6u:141: ikṣvākūṇāṃ durāpe 'rthe tvadadhīnā hi siddhayaḥ // Ragh(K)_1.71 //
GK19ragh1-6u:151: matprasūtimanārādhya prajeti tvā śaśāpa sā // Ragh(K)_1.76 //
GK19ragh1-6u:152: sa śāpo na tvayā rājanna ca sārathinā śrutaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:159: ārādhaya sapatnīkaḥ sā vāṃ kāmaṃ pradāsyati // Ragh(K)_1.80 //
GK19ragh1-6u:161: anindyā nandinī nāma dhenurāvavṛte vanāt // Ragh(K)_1.81 //
GK19ragh1-6u:171: upasthiteyaṃ kalyāṇī nāmni kīrtita eva yat // Ragh(K)_1.86 //
GK19ragh1-6u:179: avighnamastu te stheyāḥ piteva dhuri putriṇām // Ragh(K)_1.90 //
GK19ragh1-6u:182: atha pradoṣe doṣajñaḥ saṃveśāya viśāṃ patim /
GK19ragh1-6u:193: nivartya rājā dayitāṃ dayālustāṃ saurabheyīṃ surabhiryaśobhiḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:196: na cānyatastasya śarīrarakṣā svavīryaguptā hi manoḥ prasūtiḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:200: jalābhilāṣī jalamādadānāṃ chāyeva tāṃ bhūpatiranvagacchat // Ragh(K)_2.6
GK19ragh1-6u:212: śuśrāva kuñjeṣu yaśaḥ svamuccairudgīyamānaṃ vanadevatābhiḥ // Ragh(K)_2.12
GK19ragh1-6u:216: ūnaṃ na sattveṣvadhiko babādhe tasminvanaṃ goptari gāhamāne //
GK19ragh1-6u:217: sañcārapūtāni digantarāṇi kṛtvā dinānte nilayāya gantum /
GK19ragh1-6u:218: pracakrame pallavarāgatāmrā prabhā pataṅgasya muneśca dhenuḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:220: babhūva sā tena satāṃ matena śraddheva sākṣādvidhinopapannā //
GK19ragh1-6u:222: yayau mṛgādhyāsitaśādvalāni śyāmāyamānāni vanāni paśyan // Ragh(K)_2.17 //
GK19ragh1-6u:228: tadantare sā virarāja dhenurdinakṣapāmadhyagateva sandhyā // Ragh(K)_2.20
GK19ragh1-6u:233: guroḥ sadārasya nipīḍya pādau samāpya sāndhyaṃ ca vidhiṃ dilīpaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:237: itthaṃ vrataṃ pālayataḥ prajārthaṃ samaṃ mahiṣyā mahanīyakīrteḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:242: alakṣitābhyutpatano nṛpeṇa prasahya siṃhaḥ kila tāṃ cakarṣa //
GK19ragh1-6u:244: raśmiṣvivādāya nagendradattāṃ nivartayāmāsa nṛpasya dṛṣṭim // Ragh(K)_2.28
GK19ragh1-6u:245: sa pāṭalāyāṃ gavi tasthivāṃsaṃ dhanurdharaḥ kesariṇaṃ dadarśa /
GK19ragh1-6u:247: tato mṛgendrasya mṛgendragāmī vadhāya vadhyasya śaraṃ śaraṇyaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:250: saktāṅguliḥ sāyakapuṅkha eva citrārpitārambha ivāvatasthe // Ragh(K)_2.31
GK19ragh1-6u:255: alaṃ mahīpāla tava śrameṇa prayuktamapyastramito vṛthā syāt /
GK19ragh1-6u:256: na pādaponmūlanaśakti raṃhaḥ śiloccaye mūrchati mārutasya // Ragh(K)_2.34
GK19ragh1-6u:258: avaihi māṃ kiṅkaramaṣṭamūrteḥ kumbhodaraṃ nāma nikumbhamitram //
GK19ragh1-6u:259: amuṃ puraḥ paśyasi devadāruṃ putrīkṛto 'yaṃ vṛṣabhadhvajena /
GK19ragh1-6u:260: yo hemakumbhastananiḥsṛtānāṃ skandasya mātuḥ payasāṃ rasajñaḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:266: upasthitā śoṇitapāraṇā me suradviṣaścāndramasī sudheva // Ragh(K)_2.39 //
GK19ragh1-6u:267: sa tvaṃ nivartasva vihāya lajjāṃ gurorbhavāndarśitaśiṣyabhaktiḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:268: śastreṇa rakṣyaṃ yadaśakyarakṣaṃ na tadyaśaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ kṣiṇoti //
GK19ragh1-6u:269: iti pragalbhaṃ puruṣādhirājo mṛgādhirājasya vaco niśamya /
GK19ragh1-6u:273: saṃruddhaceṣṭasya mṛgendra kāmaṃ hāsyaṃ vacastadyadahaṃ vivakṣuḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:274: antargataṃ prāṇabhṛtāṃ tu veda sarvaṃ bhavānbhāvamato 'bhidhāsye //
GK19ragh1-6u:277: sa tvaṃ madīyena śarīravṛttiṃ dehena nirvartayituṃ prasīda /
GK19ragh1-6u:281: ekātapatraṃ jagataḥ prabhutvaṃ navaṃ vayaḥ kāntamidaṃ vapuśca /
GK19ragh1-6u:282: alpasya hetorbahu hātumicchan vicāramugdhaḥ pratibhāsi me tvam //
GK19ragh1-6u:283: bhūtānukampā tava cediyaṃ gaurekā bhavetsvastimatī tvadante /
GK19ragh1-6u:284: jīvanpunaḥ śaśvadupaplavebhyaḥ prajāḥ prajānātha piteva pāsi //
GK19ragh1-6u:286: śakyo 'sya manyurbhavatā vinetuṃ gāḥ koṭiśaḥ sparśayatā ghaṭodhnīḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:291: tathā samarthāṃ giramūcivāṃsaṃ pratyāha devānucaraṃ dilīpaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:293: kṣatātkila trāyata ityudagraḥ kṣattrasya śabdo bhuvaneṣu rūḍhaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:296: imāmanūnāṃ surabheravaihi rudraujasā tu prahṛtaṃ tvayāsyām // Ragh(K)_2.54
GK19ragh1-6u:297: seyaṃ svadehārpaṇaniṣkrayeṇa nyāyyaṃ mayā mocayituṃ bhavattaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:298: na pāraṇā syādvihatā tavaivaṃ bhavedaluptaśca muneḥ kriyārthaḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:300: sthātuṃ niyokturyadi śakyamagre vināśya rakṣyaṃ svayamakṣatena //
GK19ragh1-6u:301: kimapyahiṃsyastava cenmato 'haṃ yaśaḥśarīre bhava me dayāluḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:304: tadbhūtanāthānuga nārhasi tvaṃ sambandhino me praṇayaṃ vihantum //
GK19ragh1-6u:310: dadarśa rājā jananīmiva svāṃ gāmagrataḥ prasraviṇīṃ na siṃham //
GK19ragh1-6u:311: taṃ vismitaṃ dhenuruvāca sādho māyāṃ mayodbhāvya parīkṣito 'si /
GK19ragh1-6u:313: bhaktyā gurau mayyanukampayā ca prītāsmi te putra varaṃ vṛṇīṣva /
GK19ragh1-6u:314: na kevalānāṃ payasāṃ prasūtimavaihi māṃ kāmadughāṃ prasannām //
GK19ragh1-6u:315: tataḥ samānīya sa mānitārthī hastau svahastārjitavīraśabdaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:316: vaṃśasya kartāramanantakīrtiṃ sudakṣiṇāyāṃ tanayaṃ yayāce // Ragh(K)_2.64
GK19ragh1-6u:317: santānakāmāya tatheti kāmaṃ rājñe pratiśrutya payasvinī sā /
GK19ragh1-6u:318: dugdhvā payaḥ pattrapuṭe madīyaṃ putropayuṅkṣveti tamādideśa //
GK19ragh1-6u:323: tasyāḥ prasannendumukhaḥ prasādaṃ gururnṛpāṇāṃ gurave nivedya /
GK19ragh1-6u:324: mukhaprasādānumitaṃ priyāyai śaśaṃsa vācā punaruktayaiva // Ragh(K)_2.68
GK19ragh1-6u:326: papau vasiṣṭhena kṛtābhyanujñaḥ śuddhaṃ yaśo bhūya ivāvitṛptaḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:328: tau dampatī svāṃ prati rājadhānīṃ prasthāpayāmāsa vaśī vasiṣṭhaḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:330: dhenuṃ savatsāṃ ca nṛpaḥ pratasthe sanmaṅgalodagratarānubhāvaḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:332: yayāvanudghātasukhena mārgaṃ sveneva pūrṇena manorathena // Ragh(K)_2.72
GK19ragh1-6u:337: atha nayanasamutthaṃ jyotiratreriva dyauḥ surasaridiva tejo vahniniṣṭhyūtamaiśam /
GK19ragh1-6u:338: narapatikulabhūtyai garbhamādhatta rājñī gurubhirabhiniviṣṭaṃ lokapālānubhāvaiḥ // Ragh(K)_2.75
GK19ragh1-6u:344: tadānanaṃ sevitamṛttikālavaṃ nṛpaḥ samāghrāya na tṛptimāyayau /
GK19ragh1-6u:345: karīva siktaṃ pṛṣataiḥ payomucāṃ śucivyapāye vanarājipalvalam //
GK19ragh1-6u:346: divaṃ marutvāniva bhokṣyate mahīṃ digantaviśrāntaratho hi matsutaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:347: ato 'bhilāṣe prathamaṃ tathāvidhe mano babandhānyarasānvilaṅghya sā //
GK19ragh1-6u:348: na me hriyā śaṃsati kiñcidīpsitaṃ spṛhāvatī vastuṣu keṣu māgadhī /
GK19ragh1-6u:350: upetya sā dohadaduḥkhaśīlatāṃ yadeva vavre tadapaśyadāhṛtam /
GK19ragh1-6u:354: krameṇa nistīrya ca dohadavyathāmupoḍhagātropacayā rarāja sā /
GK19ragh1-6u:359: yathākramaṃ puṃsavanādikāḥ kriyā dhṛteśca dhīraḥ sadṛśīrvyadhatta saḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:363: niratyayāya prasavāya tasthuṣī babhau samāsannaphalā kriyeva sā //
GK19ragh1-6u:365: asūta putraṃ samaye śacīsamā trisādhanā śaktirivārthamakṣatam //
GK19ragh1-6u:367: babhūva sarvaṃ śubhaśaṃsi tatkṣaṇaṃ bhavo hi lokābhyudayāya tādṛśām //
GK19ragh1-6u:368: ariṣṭaśayyāṃ parito visāriṇā sujanmanastasya nijena tejasā /
GK19ragh1-6u:369: niśīthadīpāḥ sahasā hatatviṣo babhūvurālekhyasamarpitā iva // Ragh(K)_3.15
GK19ragh1-6u:371: adeyamāsīttrayameva bhūpateḥ śaśiprabhaṃ chattramubhe ca cāmare //
GK19ragh1-6u:372: sa vīkṣya putrasya cirātpitā mukhaṃ nidhānakumbhasya yuveva durgataḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:373: mudā śarīre prababhūva nātmanaḥ payodhirindūdayamūrchito yathā //
GK19ragh1-6u:374: sa jātakarmaṇyakhile tapasvinā tapovanādetya purodhasā kṛte /
GK19ragh1-6u:377: na kevalaṃ sadmani māgadhīpateḥ pathi vyajṛmbhanta divaukasāmapi //
GK19ragh1-6u:379: ṛṇābhidhānātsvayameva kevalaṃ tadā pitṚṇāṃ mumuce sa bandhanāt //
GK19ragh1-6u:380: śrutasya yāyādayamantamarbhakastathā pareṣāṃ yudhi ceti pārthivaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:382: pituḥ prayatnātsa samagrasampadaḥ śubhaiḥ śarīrāvayavairdine dine /
GK19ragh1-6u:384: umāvṛṣāṅkau śarajanmanā yathā yathā jayantena śacīpurandarau /
GK19ragh1-6u:385: tathā nṛpaḥ sā ca sutena māgadhī nanandatustatsadṛśena tatsamau //
GK19ragh1-6u:386: rathāṅganāmnoriva bhāvabandhanaṃ babhūva yatprema parasparaṃ prati /
GK19ragh1-6u:388: yadāha dhātryā prathamoditaṃ vaco yayau tadīyāmavalambya cāṅgulim /
GK19ragh1-6u:389: abhūcca namraḥ praṇipātaśikṣayā piturmudaṃ tena tatāna so 'rbhakaḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:397: avandhyayatnāśca babhūvuratra te kriyā hi vastūpahitā prasīdati //
GK19ragh1-6u:400: tvacaṃ sa medhyāṃ paridhāya rauravīmaśikṣatāstraṃ pitureva mantravat /
GK19ragh1-6u:402: mahokṣatāṃ vatsataraḥ spṛśanniva dvipendrabhāvaṃ kalabhaḥ śrayanniva /
GK19ragh1-6u:408: atha prajānāṃ ciramātmanā dhṛtāṃ nitāntagurvīṃ laghayiṣyatā dhuram /
GK19ragh1-6u:409: vaśīti matvā maticakṣuṣā suto nṛpeṇa cakre yuvarājaśabdabhāk //
GK19ragh1-6u:413: babhūva tenātitarāṃ durutsahaḥ kaṭaprabhedena karīva pārthivaḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:416: ataḥ paraṃ tena makhāya yajvanā turaṅgamutsṛṣṭamanargalaṃ punaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:417: dhanurbhṛtāmagrata eva rakṣiṇāṃ jahāra śakraḥ kila gūḍhavigrahaḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:418: viṣādaluptapratipatti vismitaṃ kumārasainyaṃ sapadi sthitaṃ ca tat /
GK19ragh1-6u:420: tadaṅganiḥṣyandalavena locane pramṛjya puṇyena puraskṛtaḥ satām /
GK19ragh1-6u:422: sa pūrvataḥ parvatapakṣaśātanaṃ dadarśa devaṃ naradevasambhavaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:425: avocadenaṃ gaganaspṛśā raghuḥ svareṇa dhīreṇa nivartayanniva //
GK19ragh1-6u:426: makhāṃśabhājāṃ prathamo manīṣibhistvameva devendra yadā nigadyase /
GK19ragh1-6u:428: trilokanāthena satā makhadviṣastvayā niyāmyā nanu divyacakṣuṣā /
GK19ragh1-6u:429: sa cetsvayaṃ karmasu dharmacāriṇāṃ tvamantarāyībhavasi cyuto vidhiḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:431: pathaḥ śucerdarśayitāra īśvarā malīmasāmādadate na paddhatim //
GK19ragh1-6u:432: iti pragalbhaṃ raghuṇā samīritaṃ vaco niśamyādhipatirdivaukasām /
GK19ragh1-6u:433: nivartayāmāsa rathaṃ savismayaḥ pracakrame ca prativaktumuttaram //
GK19ragh1-6u:434: yathāttha rājanyakumāra tattathā yaśastu rakṣyaṃ parito yaśodhanaiḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:436: hariryathaikaḥ puruṣottamaḥ smṛto maheśvarastryambaka eva nāparaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:437: tathā vidurmāṃ munayaḥ śatakratuṃ dvitīyagāmī na hi śabda eṣa naḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:439: alaṃ prayatnena tavātra mā nidhāḥ padaṃ padavyāṃ sagarasya santateḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:441: gṛhāṇa śastraṃ yadi sarga eṣa te na khalvanirjitya raghuṃ kṛtī bhavān //
GK19ragh1-6u:442: sa evamuktvā maghavantamunmukhaḥ kariṣyamāṇaḥ saśaraṃ śarāsanam /
GK19ragh1-6u:450: jahāra cānyena mayūralāñchanaṃ śareṇa śakrasya mahāśanidhvajam /
GK19ragh1-6u:451: cukopa tasmai sa bhṛśaṃ suraśriyaḥ prasahya keśavyaparopaṇādiva //
GK19ragh1-6u:455: śaśāka nirvāpayituṃ na vāsavaḥ svataścyutaṃ vahnimivādbhirambudaḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:458: sa cāpamutsṛjya vivṛddhamatsaraḥ pravāsanāya prabalasya vidviṣaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:460: raghurbhṛśaṃ vakṣasi tena tāḍitaḥ papāta bhūmau saha sainikāsrubhiḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:463: tutoṣa vīryātiśayena vṛtrahā padaṃ hi sarvatra guṇairvidhīyate //
GK19ragh1-6u:464: asaṅgamadriṣvapi sāravattayā na me tvadanyena visoḍhamāyudham /
GK19ragh1-6u:465: avaihi māṃ prītamṛte turaṅgamādvaraṃ vṛṇīṣveti tamāha vṛtrahā //
GK19ragh1-6u:468: amocyamaśvaṃ yadi manyate prabhustataḥ samāpte vidhineva karmaṇi /
GK19ragh1-6u:469: ajasradīkṣātanuradya me guruḥ kratoraśeṣeṇa phalena yujyatām //
GK19ragh1-6u:471: tavaiva sandeśaharādviśāṃpatiḥ śṛṇoti nākeśa tathā vidhīyatām //
GK19ragh1-6u:476: iti kṣitīśo navatiṃ navādhikāṃ mahākratūnāṃ mahanīyaśāsanaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:478: atha sa viṣayavyāvṛttātmā yathāvidhi sūnave nṛpatikakudaṃ dattvā yūne sitātapavāraṇam /
GK19ragh1-6u:479: munivanatarucchāyāṃ devyā tayā saha śiśriye galitavayasāmikṣvākūṇāmidaṃ hi kulavratam // Ragh(K)_3.70
GK19ragh1-6u:481: sa rājyaṃ guruṇā dattaṃ pratipadyādhikaṃ babhau /
GK19ragh1-6u:482: dinānte nihitaṃ tejaḥ savitreva hutāśanaḥ // Ragh(K)_4.1 //
GK19ragh1-6u:483: nyastaśastraṃ dilīpaṃ ca taṃ ca śuśruvuṣāṃ prabhum /
GK19ragh1-6u:495: sa hi sarvasya lokasya yuktadaṇḍatayā manaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:504: phalena sahakārasya puṣpodgama iva prajāḥ // Ragh(K)_4.12 //
GK19ragh1-6u:510: vardhiṣṇavo diśāṃ bhāgāḥ pratāpāyeva recitāḥ // Ragh(K)_4.15 //
GK19ragh1-6u:512: svaṃ dhanuḥ śaṅkiteneva saṃjahre śatamanyunā // Ragh(K)_4.16 //
GK19ragh1-6u:514: ṛturviḍambayāmāsa na punaḥ prāpa tacchriyam // Ragh(K)_4.17 //
GK19ragh1-6u:528: yātrāyai codayāmāsa taṃ śakteḥ prathamaṃ śarat // Ragh(K)_4.24 //
GK19ragh1-6u:535: sa yayau prathamaṃ prācīṃ tulyaḥ prācīnabarhiṣā /
GK19ragh1-6u:540: yayau paścādgajānīkaṃ catuḥskandheva sā camūḥ // Ragh(K)_4.30 //
GK19ragh1-6u:559: sa pratāpaṃ mahendrasya mūrdhni tīkṣṇaṃ nyaveśayat /
GK19ragh1-6u:568: nārikelāsavaṃ yodhāḥ śātravaṃ ca yaśaḥ papuḥ // Ragh(K)_4.44 //
GK19ragh1-6u:570: hriyaṃ mahendranāthasya jahāra na tu medinīm // Ragh(K)_4.45 //
GK19ragh1-6u:580: vyānaśe sapadi vyoma kīṭakośābilaṃ rajaḥ // Ragh(K)_4.50 //
GK19ragh1-6u:584: tasyāmeva raghoḥ pāṇḍyāḥ pratāpaṃ na viṣehire // Ragh(K)_4.52 //
GK19ragh1-6u:586: te nipatya dadustasmai yaśaḥ svamiva sañcitam // Ragh(K)_4.53 //
GK19ragh1-6u:598: kaṭeṣu kariṇāṃ petuḥ punnāgebhyaḥ śilīmukhāḥ // Ragh(K)_4.59 //
GK19ragh1-6u:644: rājñā himavataḥ sāro rājñaḥ sāro himādriṇā // Ragh(K)_4.82 //
GK19ragh1-6u:658: ādānaṃ hi visargāya satāṃ vārimucāmiva // Ragh(K)_4.89 //
GK19ragh1-6u:665: upāttavidyo gurudakṣiṇārthī kautsaḥ prapede varatantuśiṣyaḥ // Ragh(K)_5.1
GK19ragh1-6u:672: kāyena vācā manasā ca taptaṃ yadvajriṇo dhairyaviparyayāya /
GK19ragh1-6u:682: api prasannena maharṣiṇā tvaṃ samyagvinīyānumato gṛhāya /
GK19ragh1-6u:683: kālo hyayaṃ saṅkramituṃ dvitīyaṃ sarvopakārakṣamamāśramaṃ te //
GK19ragh1-6u:684: tavārhato nābhigamena tṛptaṃ mano niyogakriyayotsukaṃ me /
GK19ragh1-6u:685: apyājñayā śāsiturātmanā vā prāpto 'si sambhāvayituṃ vanānmām //
GK19ragh1-6u:688: sarvatra no vārttamavaihi rājannāthe kutastvayyaśubhaṃ prajānām /
GK19ragh1-6u:689: sūrye tapatyāvaraṇāya dṛṣṭeḥ kalpeta lokasya kathaṃ tamisrā //
GK19ragh1-6u:694: sthāne bhavānekanarādhipaḥ san akiñcanatvaṃ makhajaṃ vyanakti /
GK19ragh1-6u:695: paryāyapītasya surairhimāṃśoḥ kalākṣayaḥ ślāghyataro hi vṛddheḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:697: svastyastu te nirgalitāmbugarbhaṃ śaradghanaṃ nārdati cātako 'pi //
GK19ragh1-6u:699: kiṃ vastu vidvangurave pradeyaṃ tvayā kiyadveti tamanvayuṅkta //
GK19ragh1-6u:701: varṇāśramāṇāṃ gurave sa varṇī vicakṣaṇaḥ prastutamācacakṣe // Ragh(K)_5.19
GK19ragh1-6u:703: sa me cirādaskhalitopacārāṃ tāṃ bhaktimevāgaṇayatpurastāt // Ragh(K)_5.20
GK19ragh1-6u:705: vittasya vidyāparisaṅkhyayā me koṭīścatasro daśa cāhareti // Ragh(K)_5.21
GK19ragh1-6u:711: gato vadanyāntaramityayaṃ me mā bhūtparīvādanavāvatāraḥ // Ragh(K)_5.24 //
GK19ragh1-6u:712: sa tvaṃ prayaste mahito madīye vasaṃścaturtho 'gnirivāgnyagāre /
GK19ragh1-6u:717: marutsakhasyeva balāhakasya gatirvijaghne na hi tadrathasya //
GK19ragh1-6u:718: athādhiśiśye prayataḥ pradoṣe rathaṃ raghuḥ kalpitamastragarbham /
GK19ragh1-6u:719: sāmantasambhāvanayaiva dhīraḥ kailāsanāthaṃ tarasā jigīṣuḥ // Ragh(K)_5.28
GK19ragh1-6u:721: hiraṇmayīṃ kośagṛhasya madhye vṛṣṭiṃ śaśaṃsuḥ patitāṃ nabhastaḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:723: dideśa kautsāya samagrameva pādaṃ sumeroriva vajrabhinnam // Ragh(K)_5.30
GK19ragh1-6u:729: acintanīyastava tu prabhāvo manīṣitaṃ dyaurapi yena dugdhā // Ragh(K)_5.33
GK19ragh1-6u:732: itthaṃ prayujyāśiṣamagryajanmā rājñe pratīyāya guroḥ sakāśam /
GK19ragh1-6u:733: rājāpi lebhe sutamāśu tasmād ālokamarkādiva jīvalokaḥ // Ragh(K)_5.35 //
GK19ragh1-6u:734: brāhme muhūrte kila tasya devī kumārakalpaṃ suṣuve kumāram /
GK19ragh1-6u:735: ataḥ pitā brahmaṇa eva nāmnā tamagryajanmānamajaṃ cakāra // Ragh(K)_5.36
GK19ragh1-6u:736: rūpaṃ tadojasvi tadeva vīryaṃ tadeva naisargikamunnatatvam /
GK19ragh1-6u:737: na kāraṇātsvādbibhide kumāraḥ pravartito dīpa iva pradīpāt // Ragh(K)_5.37
GK19ragh1-6u:739: śrīḥ kāmayānāpi guroranujñāṃ dhīreva kanyā piturācakāṅkṣa // Ragh(K)_5.38
GK19ragh1-6u:741: āptaḥ kumārānayanotsukena bhojena dūto raghave visṛṣṭaḥ // Ragh(K)_5.39 //
GK19ragh1-6u:742: taṃ ślāghyasambandhamasau vicintya dārakriyāyogyadaśaṃ ca putram /
GK19ragh1-6u:753: babhau sa bhindansahasā taraṅgānvāryargalābhaṅga iva pravṛttaḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:774: sa mocitaḥ śāpakalestvayāhaṃ gatiṃ prapanno vihitāṃ vidhātrā /
GK19ragh1-6u:775: pratikriyāṃ cedbhavato na kuryāṃ vyarthā hi me syātsvapadopalabdhiḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:777: prasvāpanaṃ nāma yataḥ praharturna cārihiṃsā vijayaśca haste //
GK19ragh1-6u:778: alaṃ hriyā māṃ prati yanmuhūrtaṃ dayāparo 'bhūḥ praharannapi tvam /
GK19ragh1-6u:779: tasmādupacchandayati prayojyaṃ mayi tvayā na pratiṣedharaukṣyam //
GK19ragh1-6u:780: tathetyupaspṛśya payaḥ pavitraṃ somodbhavāyāḥ sarito nṛsomaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:787: mene yathā tatra janaḥ sameto vaidarbhamāgantumajaṃ gṛheśam //
GK19ragh1-6u:789: ramyāṃ raghupratinidhiḥ sa navopakāryāṃ bālyātparāmiva daśāṃ madano
GK19ragh1-6u:792: bhāvāvabodhakaluṣā dayiteva rātrau nidrā cireṇa nayanābhimukhī babhūva //
GK19ragh1-6u:795: rātrirgatā matimatāṃ vara muñca śayyāṃ dhātrā dvidhaiva jagato nanu dhūrvibhaktā /
GK19ragh1-6u:797: nidrāvaśena bhavatā hyanavekṣyamāṇā paryutsukatvamabalā niśi khaṇḍiteva /
GK19ragh1-6u:798: lakṣmīrvinodayati yena digantalambī so 'pi tvadānanarucaṃ vijahāti candraḥ
GK19ragh1-6u:799: tadvalgunā yugapadunmiṣitena tāvat sadyaḥ parasparatulāmadhirohatāṃ dve /
GK19ragh1-6u:802: svābhāvikaṃ paraguṇena vibhātavātaḥ saugandhyamīpsuriva te mukhamārutasya
GK19ragh1-6u:804: saṃlakṣyate daśanacandrikayānuviddhaṃ bimboṣṭhalabdhaparabhāgamiva smitaṃ te // Ragh(K)_5.70
GK19ragh1-6u:805: yāvatpratāpanidhirākramate na bhānurahnāya tāvadaruṇena tamo nirastam /
GK19ragh1-6u:806: āyodhanāgrasaratāṃ tvayi vīra yāte kiṃ vā ripūṃstava guruḥ svayamucchinatti // Ragh(K)_5.71
GK19ragh1-6u:809: dīrgheṣvamī niyamitāḥ paṭamaṇḍapeṣu nidrāṃ vidhūya vanajākṣa vanāyujāste /
GK19ragh1-6u:810: vaktroṣmaṇā malinayanti purogatāni lehyāni saindhavaśilāśakalāni vāhāḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:812: ayamapi ca giraṃ nastvatprabodhaprayuktāmanuvadati śukaste mañjuvākpañjarasthaḥ // Ragh(K)_5.74
GK19ragh1-6u:813: iti sa vihṛtanidrastalpamalpetarāṃsaḥ suragaja iva gāṅgaṃ saikataṃ supratīkaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:829: rarāja dhāmnā raghusūnureva kalpadrumāṇāmiva pārijātaḥ // Ragh(K)_6.6 //
GK19ragh1-6u:831: madotkaṭe recitapuṣpavṛkṣā gandhadvipe vanya iva dvirephāḥ // Ragh(K)_6.7
GK19ragh1-6u:841: pravātaśobhā iva pādapānāṃ śṛṅgāraceṣṭā vividhā babhūvuḥ // Ragh(K)_6.12
GK19ragh1-6u:859: rājā prajārañjanalabdhavarṇaḥ parantapo nāma yathārthanāmā // Ragh(K)_6.21
GK19ragh1-6u:860: kāmaṃ nṛpāḥ santi sahasrasaṅkhyā rājanvatīmāhuranena pṛthvīm /
GK19ragh1-6u:864: anena cedicchasi gṛhyamāṇaṃ pāṇiṃ vareṇyena kuru praveśe /
GK19ragh1-6u:868: tāṃ sātha vetragrahaṇe niyuktā rājāntaraṃ rājasutāṃ nināya /
GK19ragh1-6u:871: vinītabhāgaḥ kila sūtrakārairaindraṃ padaṃ bhūmigato 'pi bhuṅkte //
GK19ragh1-6u:875: kāntyā girā sūnṛtayā ca yogyā tvameva kalyāṇi tayostṛtīyā // Ragh(K)_6.29
GK19ragh1-6u:877: nāsau na kāmyo na ca veda samyag draṣṭuṃ na sā bhinnarucirhi lokaḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:878: tataḥ paraṃ duṣprasahaṃ pareṣāṃ nṛpaṃ niyuktā pratihārabhūmau /
GK19ragh1-6u:886: anena yūnā saha pārthivena rambhoru kaccinmanaso ruciste /
GK19ragh1-6u:889: babandha sā nottamasaukumāryā kumudvatī bhānumatīva bhāvam // Ragh(K)_6.36
GK19ragh1-6u:891: vidhāya sṛṣṭiṃ lalitāṃ vidhātur jagāda bhūyaḥ sunasāṃ sunandā //
GK19ragh1-6u:893: ananyasādhāraṇarājaśabdo babhūva yogī kila kārtavīryaḥ // Ragh(K)_6.38 //
GK19ragh1-6u:895: antaḥśarīreṣvapi yaḥ prajānāṃ pratyādideśāvinayaṃ vinetā // Ragh(K)_6.39
GK19ragh1-6u:903: prāsādajālairjalaveṇiramyāṃ revāṃ yadi prekṣitumasti kāmaḥ // Ragh(K)_6.43
GK19ragh1-6u:904: tasyāḥ prakāmapriyadarśano 'pi na sa kṣitīśo rucaye babhūva /
GK19ragh1-6u:908: nīpānvayaḥ pārthiva eṣa yajvā guṇairyamāśritya paraspareṇa /
GK19ragh1-6u:914: trātena tārkṣyātkila kāliyena maṇiṃ visṛṣṭaṃ yamunaukasā yaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:919: kalāpināṃ prāvṛṣi paśya nṛttaṃ kāntāsu govardhanakandarāsu // Ragh(K)_6.51
GK19ragh1-6u:925: yasya kṣaratsainyagajacchalena yātrāsu yātīva puro mahendraḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:926: jyāghātalekhe subhujo bhujābhyāṃ bibharti yaścāpabhṛtāṃ purogaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:927: ripuśriyaḥ sāñjanavāṣpaseke vandīkṛtāyā iva paddhatī dve // Ragh(K)_6.55
GK19ragh1-6u:933: tasmādapāvartata pauruṣeṇa nīteva lakṣmīḥ pratikūladaivāt // Ragh(K)_6.58
GK19ragh1-6u:935: itaścakorākṣi vilokayeti nāgāṅganābhāṃ nijagāda bhojyām // Ragh(K)_6.59 //
GK19ragh1-6u:942: anena pāṇau vidhivadgṛhīte mahākulīnena mahīva gurvī /
GK19ragh1-6u:950: sañcāriṇī dīpaśikheva rātrau yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃvarā sā /
GK19ragh1-6u:951: narendramārgāṭṭa iva prapede vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ //
GK19ragh1-6u:952: tasyāṃ raghoḥ sūnurupasthitāyāṃ vṛṇīta māṃ neti samākulo 'bhūt /
GK19ragh1-6u:955: na hi praphultaṃ sahakārametya vṛkṣāntaraṃ kāṅkṣati ṣaṭpadālī //
GK19ragh1-6u:957: pracakrame vaktumanukramajñā suvistaraṃ vākyamidaṃ sunandā // Ragh(K)_6.70
GK19ragh1-6u:964: jātaḥ kule tasya kilendukīrteḥ kulapradīpo nṛpatirdilīpaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:966: yasminmahīṃ śāsati māninīnāṃ nidrāṃ vihārārdhapathe gatānām /
GK19ragh1-6u:967: vāto 'pi nāsraṃsayadaṃśukāni ko lambayedābharaṇāya hastam // Ragh(K)_6.75
GK19ragh1-6u:968: putro raghustasya padaṃ praśāsti mahākratorviśvajitaḥ prayoktā /
GK19ragh1-6u:971: ūrdhvaṃ gataṃ yasya na cānubandhi yaśaḥ paricchettumiyattayālam //
GK19ragh1-6u:973: gurvīṃ dhuraṃ yo bhuvanasya pitryāṃ dhuryeṇa damyaḥ sadṛśīṃ bibharti //
GK19ragh1-6u:974: kulena kāntyā vayasā navena guṇaiśca taistairvinayapradhānaiḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:978: sā yūni tasminnabhilāṣabandhaṃ śaśāka śālīnatayā na vaktum /
GK19ragh1-6u:980: tathāgatāyāṃ parihāsapūrvaṃ sakhyāṃ sakhī vetradharā babhāṣe /
GK19ragh1-6u:981: ārye vrajāmo 'nyata ityathaināṃ vadhūrasūyākuṭilaṃ dadarśa // Ragh(K)_6.82
GK19ragh1-6u:983: āsañjayāmāsa yathāpradeśaṃ kaṇṭhe guṇaṃ mūrtamivānurāgam // Ragh(K)_6.83
GK19ragh1-6u:987: iti samaguṇayogaprītayastatra paurāḥ śravaṇakaṭu nṛpāṇāmekavākyaṃ vivavruḥ
